Html:
hi
i downloaded GalaSoft.MvvmLight.4.1.24.0.msi and run it. after show install wizard, progress bar appears and say done.
All file copied in C:\Program Files (x86)\Laurent Bugnion (GalaSoft)\Mvvm Light Toolkit, but nothing in Visual Studio Template or snipets.
Environment:
Windows 7 Ultimate 64 bit
Visual Studio 2012 Ultimate

Sorry for the wrong.
i found a installed folder in All Programs in Start-menu. but MvvmLight folder dose not highlighted as new installed application, and readme shortcut target was "C:\Program Files (x86)\Laurent Bugnion (GalaSoft)\Mvvm Light Toolkit\readme.html" that is incorrect. correct target is "mvvmlightreadme.html".
After reading the file "ReadMe" I realized that I should run C:/Program%20Files%20(x86)/Laurent%20Bugnion%20(GalaSoft)/Mvvm%20Light%20Toolkit/VSIX/MvvmLight.VS2012.vsix" file for add template to VisualStudio.

thanks a lot

Hi,

Sorry for the wrong shortcut to the readme. I will fix that.

Cheers
Laurent
